flawed_nl_solution:
Janessa starts with 4 cards + 13 cards = <<4+13=17>>17 cards.
She adds 17 cards + 36 cards = <<17+36=53>>53 cards from the eBay purchase.
Janessa decides to throw away 53 cards - 4 cards = <<53-4=49>>49 cards due to damage.
After giving Dexter the present we know that Janessa kept 49 cards - 29 cards = <<49-29=19>>19 cards for herself.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
